dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Léon Bottou
Yoshua Bengio
Patrick Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset comprises 28×28 gray-scale images of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Garrick Orchard
Ajinkya Jayawant
Gregory K. Cohen
Nitish Thakor
dcterms:description: The N-MNIST dataset is a neuromorphic version of the MNIST dataset, derived by panning and tilting a Dynamic Vision Sensor (DVS) in front of a screen displaying the digits. Each sample consists of a 300 ms period of ON and OFF events that represent increases or decreases in pixel intensity.
dcterms:title: N-MNIST

dcterms:creator: P. Lichtsteiner
C. Posch
T. Delbruck
dcterms:description: The DVS dataset is generated using a Dynamic Vision Sensor, which captures asynchronous temporal contrast events, providing a unique perspective on visual data.
dcterms:title: DVS (Dynamic Vision Sensor) dataset
